functions.tag:
{
          pages:[
              "[
                \"\",
                {\"text\":\"§lThe Scripture

\"},
                {\"text\":\"We have one goal: to
\"},
                {\"text\":\"breath beauty and life
\"},
                {\"text\":\"into this world
\"},
                {\"text\":\"through building. Our
\"},
                {\"text\":\"current form limits
\"},
                {\"text\":\"our ability to fulfill
\"},
                {\"text\":\"our imaginations. To
\"},
                {\"text\":\"realize our full
\"},
                {\"text\":\"potential, we must
\"},
                {\"text\":\"achieve \"},
                {\"text\":\"§oThe End \"},
                {\"text\":\"form.\"}
              ]",
              "[
                {\"text\":\"§oThe End \"},
                {\"text\":\"form is the next step in our evolution.

\"},
                {\"text\":\"It is our full potential realized. \"},
                {\"text\":\"The bounds of our mortal bodies would be lifted, we would be free to build. \"},
                {\"text\":\"§oThe End \"},
                {\"text\":\"will be granted to us by \"},
                {\"text\":\"§oThe One Above All. \"},
                {\"text\":\"She need us, her disciples, to fullfill her goals.\"}
              ]",
              "[
                {\"text\":\"With our help,

\"},
                {\"text\":\"§oThe One Above All \"},
                {\"text\":\"will snuff out the fires of the forest...

\"},
                {\"text\":\"She will cease all famine...

\"},
                {\"text\":\"She will save the sick and needy...\"}
              ]",
              "[
                {\"text\":\"She will stop the
\"},
                {\"text\":\"§kundead\"},
                {\"text\":\"from rising...

\"},
                {\"text\":\"She will elevate us to new levels

\"},
                {\"text\":\"Together, we will transform this world into a sanctuary for all, \"},
                {\"text\":\"free of violence, suffering, and \"},
                {\"text\":\"§kREDACTED\"}
              ]",
              "[
                {\"text\":\"§nWe know this.

\"},
                {\"text\":\"§oWe have already seen it in the rocks from the sky.\"}
              ]",
              "[
                {\"text\":\"§oShe waits for us.

\"},
                {\"text\":\"§oWith her thunderous roar she waits for us.

\"},
                {\"text\":\"§oWith her magical breath she waits for us.

\"},
                {\"text\":\"§oFlying high in the sky she waits for us.\"}
              ]",
              "[
                {\"text\":\"And we will find her.\"}
              ]"
            ],
            title:Scripture,
            author:Priest,
            display:{Lore:["Found in the ancient Stronghold"]}
            }
